description: This Adobe Dreamweaver CS5 New Features workshop is designed to get you quickly up to speed on Adobe Dreamweaver CS5. This workshop covers all of the new and enhanced features in version CS5 of Adobe’s web design software. These include the ability to disable and edit CSS properties or work with WordPress, Drupal, Joomla pages directly within the Dreamweaver interface. With this workshop and Dreamweaver CS5, you´ll find it easier than ever before to build and troubleshoot websites.
title: Dreamweaver CS5 New Features Workshop
